name: Tobor
overview: Written entirely in machine code for the 48K Spectrum, TOBOR is a game of strategy and skill for one or two players. You are on Kalanium in outer space to search for a valuable metal ore in the for of "Grittian Stones". These are only found in the depths of the planet and can only be reached by negotiating a series of maze-like tunnels each one being defended by a crack squadron of robots who are trained to march at you with one aim in mind - to destroy you!
